bookSourceComment:
sou=source.getVariable()
sou==""||sou==null?
(source.setVariable("搜索源[1-3]:1\n发现源[1-12]:1"),sou=source.getVariable()):""
var v = sou.split("\n")[0].match(/\d+$/)[0],
  b = sou.split("\n")[1].match(/\d+$/)[0],
  url = "https://souxs.leeyegy.com",
  uri = "https://infosxs.pysmei.com";
  name="笔趣阁"
1 == v
  ? (url = "https://sou.jiaston.com")
  : 2 == v
  ? (url = "https://souxs.leeyegy.com")
  : 3 == v
  ? (url = "https://souxs.pigqq.com")
  : ""
  
1 == b
  ? (uri = "https://content.shenbabao.com")
  : 2 == b
  ? (uri = "https://contentxs.apptuxing.com")
  : 3 == b
  ? (uri = "https://indexinfo.cdn.bcebos.com")
  : 4 == b
  ? (uri = "https://infos.anchengcn.com")
  : 5 == b
  ? (uri = "https://infosxs.pigqq.com")
  : 6 == b
  ? (uri = "https://infosxs.pysmei.com")
  : 7 == b
  ? (uri = "https://iosapp.canrike.com")
  : 8 == b
  ? (name="快读",uri = "https://kuaiapi.jiaston.com")
  : 9 == b
  ? (uri = "https://quapp.shenbabao.com")
  : 10 == b
  ? (uri = "https://scxs.pigqq.com")
  : 11 == b
  ? (uri = "https://contentxs.pigqq.com")
  : 12 == b && (uri = "https://scxs.pysmei.com");
bookSourceUrl: 笔趣阁(杀鸡取卵版)-----鲁迅

ruleBookInfo.author: $.data.Author
ruleBookInfo.name: $.data.Name

ruleExplore.author: $.Author
ruleExplore.name: $.Name##[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订合贺补加推票章字修防kK].*?[】）\)]*.*

ruleSearch.author: $.Author
ruleSearch.name: $.Name@put:{id:$.Id}
